name: Containment Breach Map File
summary: Learn about .CBMAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create your own map, open the SCP-CB Map Creator, customize your map, name your map in the lower-right field with the blinking text cursor, and click Save as. All of your CBMAP file will be saved in the "Maps" folder, which is located in the "Map Creator" folder with the Map Creator tool.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
